gmm.modal.info.about.p.1: Welcome to Giffyglyph's Monster Maker! This Foundry module pairs with GIFFYGLYPH'S MONSTER MAKER (PDF) to help you build monsters for D&D 5e real fast.
gmm.modal.info.about.p.2: If you like this module and want to see it grow, help out by becoming a patron or making a one-time donation.
gmm.modal.info.about.title: Giffyglyph's Monster Maker
gmm.modal.info.modifiers.li.1: Relative: Increase or decrease the automated value by an amount (i.e. av = av +/- x).
gmm.modal.info.modifiers.li.2: Absolute: Replace the automated value with a precise value (i.e. av = x).
gmm.modal.info.modifiers.p.1: To change an automated value (hit points, armor class, attack bonuses, etc), you can apply a positive or negative modifier.
gmm.modal.info.modifiers.p.2: There are two kinds of modifier:
gmm.modal.info.modifiers.title: Modifying Values
gmm.modal.info.modifying_abilities.p.1: To customise your monster's ability modifiers and saving throws, you can define a series of semi-colon-separated modifiers:
gmm.modal.info.modifying_abilities.p.2: These modifiers can be either relative or absolute—use them to adjust (or replace) automated values where appropriate.
gmm.modal.info.modifying_abilities.title: Modifying Abilities
gmm.modal.info.ranked_abilities.p.1: Ability modifiers and saving throw values are automatically calculated based on your monster's level, rank, and role.
gmm.modal.info.ranked_abilities.p.2: To help prioritise certain aspects, rank the six abilities from the strongest (top) to the weakest (bottom).
gmm.modal.info.ranked_abilities.p.3: The higher an ability is ranked, the more influence it has on modifiers and saving throws.
gmm.modal.info.ranked_abilities.pre.1: e.g. STR, CON, CHA, WIS, INT, DEX
gmm.modal.info.ranked_abilities.title: Ranked Abilities
gmm.modal.info.tags.p.1: Create tags to define categories and sub-types for your monster—ancestries, power sources, elements, factions, affiliations, etc.
gmm.modal.info.tags.p.2: You can create multiple tags at once by separating each tag with a semi-colon:
gmm.modal.info.tags.title: Monster Tags

gmm.monster.artifact.lair_actions.blurb: On initiative count {initiative} (losing initiative ties), you can take one of the lair actions listed below. You can't take the same lair action two rounds in a row.
gmm.monster.artifact.lair_actions.title: Lair Actions
gmm.monster.artifact.legendary_actions.b: When another creature ends it's turn, you can spend a number of legendary actions to perform one of the actions listed below. You regain spent legendary actions at the start of your turn.
gmm.monster.artifact.legendary_resistanc: When you would fail a saving throw, you can instead spend 1 legendary resistance to succeed at it. You regain spent legendary resistances when you finish a long rest.
gmm.monster.artifact.paragon_actions.blu: When another creature ends it's turn, you can spend 1 paragon action to a) move or b) perform one action (attack, help, hide, etc). You regain spent paragon actions at the start of your turn.
